item.title: The Week: Trump’s Bombastic Address to Congress
item.description: Plus: In an amazing coincidence, Hunter Biden’s paintings no longer have any buyers.

item.title: Oregon Lies About Transgender Treatments for Kids
item.description: The state is endangering minors despite no sound evidence showing the benefits of transgender treatments — and mounting evidence showing the harm.

item.title: The shape of a skyline, &c.
item.description: On a war of old; the identity of Jimmy Lai; Judge Webster vs. Kash Patel; patriotism vs. jingoism; and more.

item.title: Oprah and Whoopi’s Unexcellent Adventure
item.description: The travels and travails of politicized sisterhood.

item.title: Is the Bell Tolling for New York’s Congestion Tax?
item.description: The new tolls disproportionately hurt poor people and small businesses, and they punish older and handicapped people.
